title: Gracie Square
description: America's destiny was theirs, and their fortunes would build its greatest city.The de Kuypers gathered at Gramercy Park to welcome the New Year 1900 and herald the beginning of America's golden century. Their nation's destiny had belonged to them for generations, and the huge fortunes they had amassed were the future of their city and their country. They would build New York's subways and skyscrapers, control the stock market, and make their power felt around the world.
author: Bruce Nicolaysen
